nodes.text: A Worrt Casserole was a type of food made from worrt meat.
During 1 ABY, Bren Kingal gave a spacer a Worrt Casserole.

Salt 1 small worrt; dust with mounder flour. Saute in blue milk until brown; place in casserole dish, pour pan dripping over worrt. Add 1 handful (humanoid hand) trimpian, 1 pinch tomo spice. Fill casserole with blue milk, cover, bake at medium heat until tender. Serves 1.

Worrt Casserole appeared in the video game Star Wars Galaxies, a massively multiplayer online-role playing game developed by Sony and published by LucasArts, prior to its closure on December 15, 2011.
